name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, GPS, sleep tracking, and waterproof design. Compatible with iOS and Android.

name: Portable Power Bank
description: 10,000mAh portable charger with fast charging technology. Compact design with dual USB ports and LED indicator.

name: Ergonomic Gaming Mouse
description: Professional gaming mouse with RGB lighting, adjustable DPI up to 12,000, and programmable buttons for competitive gaming.
